cac:PartyName.cbc:Name: Department of Housing Local Government and Heritage

cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Name: Dynamic Purchasing System for the Provision of Services in relation to World Heritage in Ireland
cac:ProcurementProject.cbc:Description: The provision of services in relation to World Heritage in Ireland, where the estimated value of each contract at the mini-competition stage is valued over €5,000 (ex VAT). The DPS is divided into four (4) Categories (each a “Category”) as described below. Category 1 – Heritage Advisory and Evaluation Services; Category 2 – World Heritage Nomination and Management Services; Category 3 – Heritage Research Services; and Category 4 – Training and Education Services.
